description: Join our agile development team and work on cutting-edge enterprise applications. Responsibilities include designing scalable microservices, writing clean code, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and ensuring robust deployment pipelines.
outline: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) is a global leader in IT services, consulting, and business solutions with a vast network of innovation and delivery centers.
futureGrowth: As a pioneer in the digital transformation space, TCS continuously invests in employee growth, innovation labs, and AI-driven platforms for career acceleration.

description: You will be working on frontend and backend systems using modern web technologies like React, Node.js, and REST APIs. This internship is designed to give you real-world exposure to full-stack development in agile teams.
outline: Infosys is a global IT services company known for its strong digital capabilities and client-first approach in over 50 countries.
futureGrowth: Interns at Infosys are often considered for pre-placement offers. Infosys also offers specialized learning paths and leadership development programs.

description: We are looking for a passionate Data Scientist to build predictive models and develop data-driven solutions. You will work closely with analytics teams to interpret large data sets and present actionable insights.
outline: Wipro is a renowned multinational corporation that delivers IT, consulting, and business process services to clients around the world.
futureGrowth: Wipro continues to expand its AI and cloud services offerings, with strong investments in research, data science, and global workforce transformation.

description: Design intuitive user interfaces and enhance user experience across web and mobile platforms. Collaborate with developers and product managers to deliver top-notch digital products.
outline: HCL Technologies is a next-generation global technology company that helps enterprises reimagine their businesses for the digital age.
futureGrowth: HCL emphasizes employee reskilling, design thinking practices, and global innovation hubs to foster career development.

description: Develop and maintain cloud infrastructure using AWS and Azure. Ensure security, scalability, and performance of all deployments.
outline: Tech Mahindra provides innovative and customer-centric digital experiences, enabling enterprises to rise above competition.
futureGrowth: Focus on digital transformation and strong alliances with cloud providers ensures long-term career prospects.

description: Build, train, and deploy machine learning models for real-world applications. Collaborate with research and engineering teams on cutting-edge AI initiatives.
outline: Google India focuses on building helpful products that support digital transformation across sectors.
futureGrowth: Strong investments in AI and ML innovation, with career growth driven by a high-impact culture.

description: Implement CI/CD pipelines and automate infrastructure provisioning. Collaborate across teams to ensure system scalability and security.
outline: Amazon is a global leader in e-commerce, cloud computing, and AI innovation.
futureGrowth: Amazon's global scale and innovative culture provide vast career progression opportunities.

description: Write efficient and scalable backend logic for SaaS applications. Work with databases, REST APIs, and deployment pipelines.
outline: Zoho offers a suite of online productivity tools and SaaS applications for businesses.
futureGrowth: Known for internal promotions and skill development through in-house academies.

description: Join the AI research team to work on exploratory projects involving deep learning, NLP, and responsible AI. Ideal for candidates looking to publish and prototype AI tools.
outline: Microsoft is a global technology company empowering people and organizations through innovation.
futureGrowth: Interns often transition to full-time roles and get early access to Microsoft’s AI career tracks.

description: Monitor and analyze network traffic, conduct security assessments, and help implement risk mitigation strategies for global clients.
outline: Capgemini is a global consulting and technology services company enabling organizations to realize their business ambitions.
